Debug(string, string, string, int)

Logs a debug message if the build configuration is set to DEBUG.

public static void Debug(string msg, string sourceFilePath = "", string memberName = "", int sourceLineNumber = 0)

The debug message to log.

memberName string

sourceLineNumber int
